Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 78th overall pick, by Gashouse in 1980...
Injured on 6/20/1980 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 7/22/1983 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1987...
Had first career hit on 7/26/1987, off Sean Savino (SHP)...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/17/1989 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Traded from Gashouse to Malibu on 7/14/1990 (Going to GHG: CF P. Giroux, P J. Eitoku. Going to Mal: P P. Mcfarlane)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/14/1993 to a 3-year deal worth $2,795,900 per year...
